review:
讲个笑话
看看阵营列表，你看哪个阵营是最没牌面的，和其他文明放一起能够明显感到一股弱智味道的？

别纠结偷火药科技咯，不让他们偷点什么，他们就什么都没有了
要么是意大利制作组把鸣梁海战看多了
要么就是资方有棒子
否则制作组怎么会排除令一个特征显著的亚洲文明，选上了这么个偷子人？

总之游戏还行，DLC有点缺德不过甚至好过某些大厂

author: {'steamid': '76561198205774116', 'num_games_owned': 379, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1587302587}
review: Only played the AI and not online but this part doesn't bother me anyway. It is obviously an Age of Empires inspired game and does add some stuff and takes away others. Its fun to play and is a good game in its own right. My only 2 complaints is the units are hard to tell apart, but a few more battles might help this. The only thing is upgrade don't feel like they make a massive difference. In AoE upgrading from men at arms up to champions is a massive  improvement but here it is hard to tell a difference. It does matter however as i had a smaller army but won the battle so the upgrades had to have helped it just doesn't feel like it

author: {'steamid': '76561198930329609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1587279376}
review: Неплохая и достаточно интересная стратегия, похожа на Age of Empires. Достаточно симпатичная и слегка мультяшная графика, возможность отстроить королевство и создать огромную армию, состоящую из кавалерии, лучников и обычных бойцов. Лично мне очень понравилась. Единственный минус - баги.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000895497', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5484, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1004, 'last_played': 1589750403}
review:
Ce jeu est vraiment bien fait que ce soit au niveau graphisme ou gameplay. Si vous aimez les RTS vous allez aimer c'est sûr ! Léger point négatif : c'est très très long pour avoir des civilisations supplémentaires sans acheter. Tout le monde joue byzantin presque et dès qu'on tombe sur une civilisation étrangère c'est la défaite assurée si on ne connaît pas la civilisation adverse.

Ce jeu n'est pas un pay to win mais c'est rageant de se faire renverser par des Aztèques...

Faites des jeton de civilisation simple comme ça on peut acheter la civilisation que l'on veut avec 4 jetons au lieu de les attribuer de base à une civilisation. Soyez aussi plus généreux sur la montée en niveau ou en quête parce que c'est super long aussi !

author: {'steamid': '76561198000794574', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1586640654}
review: Zdecydowanie nie polecam. Gra ma potencjał na typowego RTS'a, ale graficznie jest zwyczajnie brzydka. Nie chodzi tu o samą jakość klockowatych modeli, bo to tylko unity. Ale kolory strasznie męczą gracza, są matowe i przydymione, przez co wiele elementów potrafi umknąć. Największy minus tej gry to optymalizacja, gra potrafi zwolnić do 20FPS już przy 50 jednostkach na mapie i to przy nieruchomej kamerze a trzeba pamiętać, że to początek gry. (oczywiście moj komputer spełnia zalecane wymagania gry).   Do late-game nie doczekałem gdyż spadki FPS uniemożliwiają gre, nawet ustawiając wszystko na minimum. Są lepsze darmowe RTSy, oferujące więcej jednostek, więcej budynków a przede wszystkim więcej ras.

review: Esta muy bueno el juego, al principio me andaba muy lento pero, me di cuenta que si cambiaba los gráficos de pantalla con bordes a pantalla completa aumento mucho la velocidad, obviamente como cualquier juego poner una resolucion que se adecue a la pantalla, recomiendo configurarla con una partida abierta por que a veces se te van los botones fuera de la pantalla y de esa manera podes medir que quede encajado. ¿Que puedo decir de este juego? Apenas lo estoy empezando pero, es muy al estilo clásico del Age of Empires. Me gusta ^_^

author: {'steamid': '76561198313606506', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1585552116}
review:
AI가 적당히 멍청하면 해보겠는데요...


클래식은 게임 느낌만 살렸음 됐지 AI까지 90년대로 가버리다니..

지점을 향해 이동하면서 공격! 이라는 키가 있길래 어택땅 같은 개념인줄 알았는데, 진짜 이동하면서 걸리는 무언가에만 공격을 합니다. 화면에 나오고, 시야에 걸려도... 걷는 방향으로 일직선상에 적이 있으면 적이 자신을 공격하든 말든 이동을 우선으로 해요.

병력이 거의 비슷한 수준까지 모여도, 상대는 하나하나 컨트롤 하는 AI고, 저는 어택을 찍으면 열심히 맞으면서 돌격하다가 결국 한대 때려보지도 못하고 다 죽는 병사들입니다. 30마리가 넘는 병력이 뭉쳐서 싸우는데 하나하나 컨트롤하는게 베이스로 깔린 게임이라니요...

author: {'steamid': '76561198131402930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1593417942}
review:
I've played only the tutorial, and watched some games.
Graphics: I love this kind of graphics well it is a personal thing! but with a GTX 970 Ultra was using 100% of my GPU power only in the tutorial, Ouch!
Gameplay: _ User interface is Cool I like it to be loose without static boxes everywhere
                  _ Each Society having its own building visuals is so cool!
                  _ Each Society having its own perks based on real life History is well done!
                  _ Army formations is nice!
However some improvements:
_ hold right click and move the mouse event to line up your troops in a direction
_ villagers needs to have morale, like they need bathes, libraries, shops, schools or they work slower
_ soldiers also needs to have morale, like ++perks after winning a small battle, if they fight near their fort ++perks, if they fight behind their walls ++perks, Leader speeches ++perks, --perks if they kill villagers, --perks if they are being attacked by archers....
_ villagers should be able to defend themselves
_ larger mineral deposits
_ leaders to lead the army with perks
_ and the best of them all soldiers need to have a better response, like if you select the spear men and mark him to prioritize horsemen at first clash he attacks the nearest enemy but if a horseman and a swordsman are both in front of him he goes for the horseman, same to the archers if 20 archers are attacking a single target and only 10 can kill 1 the other 10 needs to be attacking someone else!!!
_ make a mode in online playing: defender and attacker, where the defender needs to build forts and walls and defend the attacker where each having perks helping him in his purpose

overall it is a fine to nice game which needs more development, i think this is still beta!

author: {'steamid': '76561198088982873', 'num_games_owned': 203, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1583595469}
review:
This game has so many weird things. One of them being unable to properly play with AI, since they will eventually steal all your resource nodes leaving you with none. Seriously, what the hell is that about?
The AI also loves building in your cities, blocking your plans of how you planned on building.

Maybe tone down the AI a bit, devs? I thought it'd be fun playing with AI, regular Skirmish AI battles, but nope, I was wrong. It's fucking annoying and unplayable after a certain time limit where the AI decides "this is da way I go now" and builds anywhere they want and grab all resource nodes from under your nose.

author: {'steamid': '76561198314683075', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4753, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4504, 'last_played': 1660768671}
review:
Points positifs :

-Le jeu est très beau graphiquement parlant, j'aime beaucoup ce côté du jeu !
-La mécanique du jeu est super (j'adore ce type de jeu), cela ressemble à AOE !
-Le jeu offre quelques modes de jeu mais seulement 2 sont bien : multijoueur et escarmouche solo avec IA.
-La durée de vie du jeu est correcte moi je ne m'en lasse toujours pas après 72h de jeu ! Super sympa à jouer avec des potes !
-Le jeu offre la possibilité d'acheter des factions supplémentaires à 4€, le gameplay change totalement avec celles-ci vu leurs caractéristiques ! Mais le meilleurs c'est qu'elles n'avantage pas trop ceux qui sont restés avec la civilisation de base (très correcte elle même)
-Je trouve le jeu bien équilibré pour ma part !
-Pour finir avec les points positifs : Le jeu est gratuit ! Et ça c'est vraiment génial rien à dire là dessus !

-Points négatifs :

-La consommation du jeu... C'est trop élevé ! Mon ordinateur chauffe beaucoup trop ! Je pense le jeu mal codé de ce côté là ! (même en qualité graphique basse !)
-Aucuns accès au workshop ! Aucunes possibilités de maps supplémentaires par exemple ! Dommage !
-Les IA... Une catastrophe... Exemples :
          -Des fois les IA jouent correctement mais d'autres fois elles sont comme... AFK ? Elles ne font rien ou presque !
          -Leurs armées ! Même en mode "Plus difficile" leur armée n'est pas super super... Le début est chaud et puis la fin tranquille !
          -Revenons sur les armée justement... Parfois les IA font des armées de... paysans !! Juste des paysans... Avec 10 chevaux leur village est rasé... Et encore
          -Les portes automatiques... Quand les portes sont automatiques, elles se ferme quand un ennemis arrive et s'ouvre quand c'est un allié, là n'est pas le problème mais les IA adverses détectent la porte ouverte quand elle est sur automatique ! Donc leur armée arrive (elle se fait tirer dessus) puis les portes se ferme (logique) donc l'IA détecte que c'est fermé et repart ! 5 secondes plus tard les portes se ré-ouvre donc l'armée revient et se fait encore tirer dessus ! Les IA meurt toutes seules !!
          -Les IA ne construisent pas de murs... C'est juste trop facile ! Aucuns remparts pour nos guerriers, juste des ferme en face, vous imaginez le carnage gratuit...
Finis pour les IA !
-Le mode survie (les IA vous lancent des vagues d'ennemis)... Grosse erreur la dessus ! Que 2 filons de pierre et d'or ! On ne peut pas faire une muraille complète, la carte est trop petite et il manque des arbres ! Infâme ce mode ! Plus de pierre : plus de remparts ! Plus de bois : Plus de ferme donc plus de nourriture ! Plus d'or : plus d'armée... Il nous reste quoi ?
-Pour finir... Devs ? Vous êtes où ? vous faites quoi en fait ? Aucune mise à jour pour régler les bugs et problèmes que l'on vous signal ! Je suis sur que vous ne poserez même pas un oeil sur ce commentaires ! Mais le pire c'est que depuis l création du jeu, il y a des maps marquées "en développement"... Mais bien sûr !! Il vous faut combien de temps pour créer une seule map ? 3 ans ?

Pour conclure : Manque d'activité des développeur (pas un petit manque hein...) Je recommande tout de même le jeu car la mécanique est bonne, les graphisme sont bon et le jeu est gratuit

Note globale : 3/5

author: {'steamid': '76561198329489993', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 595, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 385, 'last_played': 1640783821}
review: 还蛮好玩的，卡通版帝国。不过操作上有点别扭，文明没有升级一说，其实应该有多套建筑模型，像帝国时代一样，从贫民窟升级到小房子看起来就会很好，这个所有建筑模型都是固定的，不够精细，建筑种类也比较少，没有所谓世界奇迹一类的终极建造。推电脑很简单，基本上前期探视野后在要塞口造一些防御工事，然后爆农民狂敛资源，资源够了疯狂一波兵很轻松能推N个电脑，电脑AI不够高，不回扩张，只会在自己地盘死守。

review:
에이지 오브 엠파이어 2의 체험판 같은 느낌이랄까. 
대놓고 베낀 게임이지만 뭔가 많이 부족하다... 반글화도 문제. 
종족 (문명) 을 죄다 유료판매하는 것도 맘에 안 든다. 두세개는 풀어주지. 
그래도 무료니까 봐준다. 일단은 추천하는 걸로. 
한국 문명을 DLC로 샀는데, 한글 더빙이 어설프게나마 되어있다.

А пока скажу только было очень приятно её попробовать, поиграю еще не раз)

author: {'steamid': '76561198249743354', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1578283204}
review:
Игра просто напросто бред. 

1.Онлайн

1.1 Обьясню почему:
1.2 Не будет так как на скринах. Вы будете тупо отстраивать казармы и всё, будете драться до тех пор пока не подохните. Будет тупо понажовщина с отстройкой одного здания
1.3 Покупать другие цивилизации - смысла нет. Вас будут ебать и без того на стандартных фракциях.
1.4 Покупка цивилизации ничего вам не предвнесёт даже чуть чуть. Какие то дополнительные пушечки и танчики будут сосать вместе с вами.
1.5 Я не верю что там такие игроки, обьясню почему. На каждой 10-ой минуте прибегает фуловая кавалерия. Всегда так. Вас будут кидать с задротами, не с новичками.
1.6 Вас всё время будет кидать в СОЛО режим 1 VS 1. НИКОГДА такого не было чтобы меня кидало 2 на 2.
1.7 Онлайн мёртв, сервером нет вообще. Есть только задроты которые играют 1 на 1.

Кампания 
Не играл.

Скачивал игру только ради онлайна, в кампании я уже наигрался вдоволь. Для этого есть другие более интересные игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198949891211', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 609, 'last_played': 1612582633}
review:
리뷰 처음해서 많이 불편해도 읽어주시고 피드백 주시면 감사합니다. 
일단 그레픽 호불호 가 갈리고 고증에 문제 있지만 밸런스 문제이고 하고 시대고증은 무시하고 우리문화가 들어가있는거에 만족하면 좋겠습니다 . 참고로 우리 한국인 문명은 수비형이고 궁수는 다른 문명에 비해 안좋아서 고증이 안되지만 신기전 때문에 밸런스로 그런거 같습니다. 신기전은 기본공격은 안되지만 5초 간격을로 스킬을 사용해서 사용해야하는 불편함이 있지만 스타에 등장하는 고위기사 싸이오 스톰 같이 쓰시면 됩니다 (4대가 동시에 쏘면 왠만한 보병 궁수 공성무기는 죽음) 
좀 벗어 낮지만 우리문명을 요약하면 시작하자마자 자원보너스 생산보너스 가지고 초중반 버티면서 후반 공성무기 로 이기는 문명입니다. 병력구성은 공성무기 빼고  강하다고 말하수가 없지만(궁수진 중국이 우위, 기마대 (비자틴,프랑스,몽골) 이 우위, 보명 아즈택이 우위,) 하지만 이들 문명하고 다르게 다양한 병력 구성을 구성할수 있으며 (ex 아즈택한태 없는 기마대 사용해서 기동성 우위,..) 
신기전을 잘쓰면 상대는 기마대 구성으로 상대할수 밖에없으며( 컨트롤과 손가락실력에 따라 뽑는걸 추천 저는 4대로 왜냐면 너무 가까이 있으면 버그인지 팀킬됨 범위가 생각보다 광범위하고 스킬 사용하고 도착할때까지 느려서 오히려 우리부대 죽일수도 있음동시에 쏘는거 보다 급하지 않으면 한두개씩 발사하길을 추천)정형적인 니가와가 강력함 그럼 많이 부족하지만 리뷰는 여기 까지 하겠습니다

author: {'steamid': '76561198084741508', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 524, 'last_played': 1615623849}
review:
Bon jeux avec de bonne base . Très ressemblant à "age of" mais avec un équilibrage bien mieux et beaucoup moins de problème de collisions.  J'ai apprécier y jouer mais pas assez de joueur actif dessus , et le mode survie qui peut duré des heures sans réel challenge.

Note aux challenge des factions , qui sont très difficile et qui demande de la reflection et de la rapidité d'actions

Avoir des cosmétiques pour les unités est une bonne idées , mais trop peut de diversité dedans due au manque de popularité.

Petit point négatif quand même , impossible d'acheter les factions autrement que en sortant la carte de crédit et pas de réel moyens de les tester avant.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010241329', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1575942907}
review:
As a long time AOE2 fan, this games not half bad.

Although there are some main flaws such as  :

Wonky AI that somehow snowballs early, comes at you with 50-100 units , but then retreats, for the rest of the game it acts like it has absolutely no idea what its doing. The first "tutorial" skirmish i played the AI ramped up so quickly, it was insane, i wasnt even taking my time. 

Saw an issue where my ally somehow accepted an alliance with our 1 mutual enemy late game and just sat around watching me fight him.

Idk it could be a cool game. I opened some chests after a game, got 2 purple legendary items but have absolutely no idea where they went.. Looks like you can equip different cosmetics on your units which is pretty neat.

Theres a "try" before you buy option for the paid to play factions, i appreciate that.

I may come back to this later if the AI improves.

author: {'steamid': '76561198259343058', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 986, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 451, 'last_played': 1596792167}
review: The game is fairly well-rounded, though the harder and hardest bots are a challenge for newer players, since they can out-tech you pretty fast, though the game is very well polished. I would like it if there was a game history log added to the game to review past matches to see mistakes made in the previous game. Another feature to give the game more depth is if they add a more complex tree of economy or military, especially mutually exclusive branches. This can help to prevent players from getting every single building the moment they have the resources for it and just focus only on efficiency and stacking, rather than carefully considering how they want to use and manage both their resources and troop classes (unless presented with multiple enemies in one game), causing the game to lose its strategic orientation and just be about grinding to get all the upgrades as fast as possible. (Edit: Pls fix the lag issue when multiple bots are present)

review: After only 2 hours of play, I am quite impressed with this free RTS. It is like Age of Empires 2 in 3D, just what AOE3 should have been. I love the graphics (and yes, I have also seen the AOE4 graphics in trailer). As others have pointed out, it is fast paced (though it took me 2 hours to win my first skirmish) like StarCraft2 and has ranked ladder. Exactly the game I was looking for.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995205126', 'num_games_owned': 632, 'num_reviews': 743, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1572944428}
review:
[b]Empires Apart[/b] to bardzo dobra i wciągająca, a co najważniejsze darmowa (obecnie) gra strategiczna, odczuwalnie posiadająca duszę gry Age of Empires (a nawet jej klon), lecz prezentująca się we własnym nowoczesnym stylu - co nie jest złe, prócz tego że mikrotransakcje, kuferki, występują tu aż miło.

[h1]Ale do rzeczy:[/h1]

Omijając mikrotransakcje, skrzyneczki, kosmetykę itp. w samej grze, bo [b]można grać bez tego również[/b] – to przed naszymi oczami ukazuję się dobra gra strategiczna.

Początkowe wprowadzenie, samouczek, sama gra to odczuwalny klon dobrze znanego przez wszystkich [b]Age of Empires[/b] – w formie bardziej pociętej, z racji tego że twórca oferując darmowy tytuł na pozostałych aspektach będzie chciał zarobić.

Biorąc pod uwagę że na rynku pojawiła się odświeżona edycja gry [b]Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition[/b], bądź można nabyć starszą lecz nadal działającą wersje owego tytułu – to czy Empires Apart jest warta naszego czasu? 

Moim skromnym zdaniem - Tak.

[h1]Empires Apart czy Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition?[/h1]

Z jednej strony mamy darmową produkcje, dość mocno pociętą lecz dająca dużo zabawy w grze z komputerowym przeciwnikiem lub innym graczem.

Z drugiej strony znacznie bogatsza grę pod każdym względem Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition w cenie ok 92zł (cena Steam), edycje pudełkowe starszych edycji gry ok 20zł.

[h1]Podsumowanie:[/h1]

Empires Apart to bardzo dobra gra, nowoczesny klon Age of Empires, jest darmowa, daje dużo zabawy w grze z komputerowym przeciwnikiem jak i prawdziwym graczem – lecz nie spodziewajcie się rozbudowanych elementów, zawartości który ma AoE.

Polecam!


[quote][b]Szukasz więcej recenzji?[/b] Zapraszam.
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/32785706/ ]Kurator walas85[/url]
Zachęcam wszystkich do obserwacji kuratora, by na bieżąco otrzymywać świeże informacje o nowo zrecenzowanych tytułach.[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198287302928', 'num_games_owned': 396, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1575576771}
review:
Empires Apart è uno strategico in tempo reale ben realizzato, che soffre di un problema tipico di molti giochi essenzialmente online, pubblicati per qualche mese in Accesso Anticipato: la carenza di giocatori abbordabili per i neofiti. Per il resto è difficile trovargli dei veri e propri difetti, a parte una certa carenza di contenuti. DESTINYbit ha scelto di concentrarsi su alcuni aspetti, che ha curato benissimo, così da evitare di disperdere le energie per abbozzare mille caratteristiche, senza però portarle a compimento.

PRO

Meccaniche base rifinite
Buona configurabilità delle partite, online e offline
Fazioni varie e ben caratterizzate

CONTRO

Il single player è sostanzialmente una grossa modalità di allenamento
Qualche problema di pathfinding dell'intelligenza artificiale

Voto : 7

author: {'steamid': '76561198294511742', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2049, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 886, 'last_played': 1581473783}
review:
It's free to play Age of Empires 2, essentially, and it's actually pretty good. You start with the Byzantine civ for free, and the other civs cost money. Every day you play you can get chests, one for the first game you win, and one each time you go up a level. Chests give you appearance customization options for your units and whatnot mostly, but if you're lucky you can get random sigil drops. Collect four sigils from a civilization, and you get that civ for free. So, if you're willing to spend time grinding, and RNGeezus is good to you, then the whole game is free to play. Eventually.
I still think it's a pretty good game, although some more skirmish maps would be nice.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061668113', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1579705432}
review:
Played a few multiplayer games, starting to really enjoy this game. 

Pros:
-My PC specs are slightly lower than their minimum and run this game super smooth on medium settings. 
-Gameplay is pretty smooth, a nice array of units, game is not too over complicated. Only a few levels for you civilization to progress through, which I honestly prefer, rather than going from 0-100. 
-Games won't take ridiculously long, some real tactics can be used, this game is like a Age of Empires kinda game with cooler civilizations. 

Cons:
-There is only ONE free civilization, I reckon atleast 2 or 3 would be good to build a bigger fan-base. (biggest issue IMO)
Maps could be a bit bigger, they're quite small? Probably like 20% bigger would be perfect.

End points: 

-I was actually surprised that I have been able to find online games pretty quickly and easily: like 5 mins MAX, for ranked games. 
-At the end of the day, this game is free and pretty enjoyable to kill some time and test your strategy, however it is quite simple and does not allowed for any crazy tactics other than defending an early rush or rushing someone. 

6.8/10

-Would be like 7.5 or higher if there were more civilizations available from the beginning, or a slightly more complex pathway for the Byzantines.

review:
Игра мне зашла!!! Это не шедевр но очень неплохая стратегия, есть конечно и свои минусы, но они настолько малы что про них не стоит говорить, хотя можно упомянуть некоторые самые глобальные такие как маленький онлайн, много контента платного, мало карт и юнитов, воинов, жителей, оружия и разного другого! Хотелось бы видеть другие фракции Спарту, Россию, Афины, Рим и много других стран и цивилизация, больше разных анимаций и всего разного. Потенциал у игры есть!Разработчики молодцы, удачи!

The game came to me !!! This is not a masterpiece but a very good strategy, of course, there are some drawbacks, but they are so small that you should not talk about them, although you can mention some of the most global ones such as small online, a lot of paid content, few maps and units, warriors, residents, weapons and other things! I would like to see other factions of Sparta, Russia, Athens, Rome and many other countries and civilization, more than different animations and all the different. The game has potential! Developers well done, good luck!

author: {'steamid': '76561198038751912', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1321, 'last_played': 1569740673}
review:
I honestly thought that for a F2P game, this was going to be another game I spent no more than an hour on. As of writing this, I've been absorbed in the game itself. It is fantastically built, and is a gem in my library!

The only negative I have is that not enough people play it. I sit for far too long in the queue, but this is due simply to a lack of players. 

Download it, try it... It's free. And I guarantee it'll be time well spent.

review:
Played for just a few minutes, but it was long enough to be annoyed by this poorly designed game. It was terrible.

Way WAY to close camera view, Your first character in the tutorial literally screams every time you have her move, incredibly  annoying. The ESC key does nothing, and the "back button" option is not in the same positions in the different menues, you also cannot control the camera with the keyboard, its hard to tell the difference between the selectable build options and the greyed out ones. Like who designed this thing, and did they intend to make it annoying to play? No thanks. I do not recommend this title.

review: Blatant rip off, copy cat & clone of Age of Empires, what makes this game different from AoE though? Its free, its worse, it has loot boxes and worthless digital trash called cosmetics. The tutorial skirmish took me nearly 90 minutes, i lost my main base and had to rebuilt in the lower corner which the AI allowed me to do and it never pulled back its army to defend the main city, so, suffice to say, this game or RTSes in general, arent for me, not anymore atleast, (i grew up on RTSes though, original C&Cs and Dune Battle For Arrakis, Warcraft 2 were my first ones, loved them, played them as a kid in the late 90s or early 2000s, dont remember.) or AoE and its clones, or... i dont know, im just bad at games, okay? Esspecialy any strategy one, the complex, the worse i do. So uh, if you somehow are stripped for cash, want to try out RTSes, and for NO REASON dont want to try out the free Command and Conquer titles from the website called Communications Centre....then...go for this i guess.... if you do have money though, buy the actual AoE & C&C games, not the ''defenitive'' versions though, the original ones, the actual good ones.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003818180', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1599, 'playtime_forever': 726, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 725, 'last_played': 1567111633}
review:
Empires Apart no es un juego a la altura de los tiempos que corren. Entiendo perfectamente que son apuestas de estudios pequeños sin un alto presupuesto, pero desde mi humilde opinión y por lo menos como esta ahora: sin campaña, limitado a jugar contra la IA porque apenas hay gente jugando para el multijugador y cuelgues, no lo recomendaría.

Positivo:
-Free to Play
-Facciones diferenciadas
-Explota y mejora las virtudes del clásico Age of Empires
-Música decente

Negativo:
-Gráficos Low Cost
-IA mejorable
-No cuenta con campaña
-El modo Desafió es meramente relleno
-Prácticamente sin jugadores para el multiplayer

author: {'steamid': '76561198796334282', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1567101271}
review:
This is my own personal experience, might not be the same for you guys.

I was having problems the minute I started up the game. I don't know why the devs thought it was a good idea to put the graphics to Ultra as default, so I lowered it. Crashed immediately. Reloaded it, set it to low, froze again before it worked. Managed to complete the tutorial, barely, and was ready to play with my friends (the main reason I got the game in the first place).

I don't know about you, but I play games for fun. But what's the fun in getting disconnected time and time again from the same match for no less than an hour? My laptop can handle Star Conflict (a rather big game) War Thunder, Cosmoteer, Kingdoms and Castles, and other games without problems, but for some unknown reason, this game's optimisation is so bad that I can't even get a lick of entertainment and enjoyment out of the game.

All in all, if you're looking for a game that isn't too taxing on your low end computer, this game is not for you.

I'll give it a positive review once they've made a few updates to make the game playable for low end devices.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133319432', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1611744429}

* Si amas los juegos RTS y eres fan de las entregas AOE este juego no te va a decepcionar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198332849567', 'num_games_owned': 221, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1566512131}
review:
Good parts:
- nice graphics
- in comparison to Age of Mythology, this game allows to select more units
- in comparison to Age of Mythology, each unit takes 1 unit space, so you can build a larger army
- ability to plan in advance - while the building is being built, you can alreayd select the upgrades that will be explored as soon as the building is complete

Bad parts:
- AI is stupid af. It took me 29 minutes to defeat Hard AI and 21 minute to defeat Hardest. For some reason, AI thinks that building 3 Town Centers, 20 houses and  then spamming farmers is better early in the game than making an army, upgrading it quickly and attacking first.
- No variation in development. In Age of mythology you could select different gods that gave you different powers and bonuses, so it kinda impacted your game, while here you just follow a single progression.
- Each time your farm expires, you need to "repair" it in order to use again. Weird and distracting
- A bit buggy. Sometimes farmer AI have trouble finding resources like trees etc. Sometimes they don't do the action from the 1st try
- Warrior AIs take 1 unit out of the crowd (not with the lowest HP) and the whole bunch of them then follows this one target. Would be better if this logic was improved and sophisticated a bit.
- No powers, no heroes (only 1 in fact).
- There are a lot of paid nations, although they are mechanically the same with some minor variations
- I have a feeling that devs took more time to diversify the game by add ing textures and models and integrating them as a system of chests, instead of acutally working on the game and making sure that it's interesting to play. Come on, textures in a strategy game? I can barely see that sword that a warrior is holding, I can't even notice the difference between the standard model and the one I got from a chest. 

It's a good start for a game. If you removed useless chests, made less nations, but made them more different, improved the AI and added something challenging, non-standard to the game, it would be a fun game to play. But at the moment it looks like an early access game. You concentrated a lot on progression and chests, while you should think more of adding diversity to the game and making it interesting to play for more than 1 evening.

review: Its basically a re-skin of age of empires 2, but this time to play different factions its been chopped up and sold separately from the base game. Other downfall is there only being 7 or so factions to pick from once purchased. Plus points is the AI are very good, and aggressive, they will rush you. I still dont understand the whole lootbox concept, its a strategy game! I still rate it a decent game, about 6 out of 10. Just a bigger fan of the AOE series, comparing to this online battler of a game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001357450', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1565727681}
review:
In short, this game in terrible.

Why?

1) The game has been put behind a free-to-play scheme with lootboxes, because it was making no money being sold as an actual game.

2) The game is really buggy. You can set farmers to auto-seed (when the farm is depleted) but 9 times out of 10 they don't do it. It got very annoying, very fast.

3) Resource management is 90's style, where everything is depleted and resources don't seem to cover costs.

4) UL is unclear and confusing. Everything from menu selection to where to click to advance to the next "age" (that doesn't really exist here, it's more like an upgrade option) is unclear and I had a difficult time trying to find where to click.

5)  Units are extremely weak and will damage easily, against civilians (of all people).

6) Lack of game variety. For a game that used to be charged, if this is all that's available it's incredibly disapointing.

7) The artistic style is ugly, blocky and convuluted. Colours don't seem to blend together well so all the visual effects on the screen are overbearing.

In short, play Age of Empire definitive edition when it comes out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198801079917', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1564770873}
review: Искусственный интеллект развивается за три минуты. Пока ваши ленивые крестьяне собирают еле-еле ресурсы, ИИ уже ломится к вам с армией по последним технологиям. И это на среднем уровне. Смысла играть для меня лично нет. Так как играть в эту игру мне не с кем, а с ИИ просто не возможно в силу того, что он за 3 минуты достиг экономического развития и на одиннадцатой идёт гасить моё поселение.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045949499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1492, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 923, 'last_played': 1624908050}
review:
Ce jeu à l'air bon, mais je le système de sélection des unités est très mauvaise.
- le double clic pour sélectionner toutes les unités identiques fonctionne très mal, il faut recommencer la manip une bonne  trentaine de fois pour que le double clic soit enfin validé
- la sélection par encadrement avec la souris ne fonctionne pas non plus. j'encadre toutes les unités dont j'ai besoin avec la souris, mais rien ne se passe, aucune unité n'est sélectionné. Il faut recommencer une bonne trentaine de fois pour que l'encadrement soit prit en compte et sélectionne enfin les unités encadrés. Ce problème rend le jeu très désagréable, voir injouable.
 
Imaginez en plein combat ou il faut utiliser 50 unités, dois je les sélectionner une à une pour être sûr que cela soit pris en compte ? C'est la défaites assurée.

author: {'steamid': '76561198214739864', 'num_games_owned': 80, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 793, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 700, 'last_played': 1578799048}
review:
I've logged an awful lot of time into this game, and have recorded many different games that I have played, and I have to say, I am quite pleased with how the game plays compared to other games of this style.

Gameplay moves pretty quickly once you get going, but slow enough that it doesn't feel rushed. With a huge variety of units and civilizations, no two games feel the same. Each time you go to play, you can always expect something new.

One of the downsides however, is some of the simple little bugs. Like units getting stuck, or buildings not building, make the game a little frustrating at times, but it doesn't make the game unplayable by any means.

I would recommend this game to any player who has tried Age of Empires, as this is a great option if you're looking for a free-to-play option.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025347152', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1563261054}
review:
游戏不错，但缺点也很明显。
1、操作上，当我想要移动画面，用鼠标移动到画面边缘时，有很多次不能顺利的移动画面，但用键盘上的方向键就不会出现这个问题。
2、汉化不全面，很多地方是中英文混合的，虽然不是很影响操作，但还是希望能改进。
3、“后退”功能设计的不够人性化，很多“后退”功能应该用键盘上的ESC按键就可以操作，但游戏中必须用鼠标点击“箭头”才可后退。

author: {'steamid': '76561198200660294', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1582395421}
review:
Edit: Unfortunately, the game has become unplayable with constant fatal errors.

So this game was exactly what I've been looking for since Age of Empires 3. It's a mixture of Age of Empires 3 gameplay, Age of Empires 2 and Civilization V UI in a low poly art style. It plays well and I didn't encounter any issues thus far. There are some areas that still might need some work, such as using keybinds/keys to use the UI (or at least open the game menu).

author: {'steamid': '76561198105791473', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 389, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1563225492}
review:
Having played every Age of Empires game, including my favorite which was Age of Empires Online, I can say that Empires Apart has great potential, but lacks popularity which is detrimental to the game's growth in the long run. The graphics are simple, yet elegant and the gameplay can range from slow, turtle-like strategies to fast-paced assaults on the enemy base.

The new loot box system might seem a little confusing at first, but it functions exactly like Age of Empires Online's loot system worked; Any items gained from loot boxes, which you can earn by playing and leveling up, are cosmetic and can be applied to customize the look of your favorite civilizations. You want Byzantine spearmen to have a massive axe? Can do!

The sound design is good overall, but it sadly lacks anything that really knocks the game out of the park. The old games, namely Age of Mythology, had very memorable soundtracks which, despite them being almost or even more than a decade old, I can still fully remember because they were so catchy and well-designed. Whilst the sounds and music of Empires Apart are not lacking in quality, they are not something that will endlessly stick by you. A neat point, however, is that every civilization speaks their native tongue properly as far as I personally can tell.

Interface and hotkeys are a hot topic for debate on this game, and I have to agree with the critics on this one. Most if not all of us are used to the standard interface, GUI and hotkeys that the Age of Empires series, Starcraft and other RTS games use, so it might be prudent to follow the set formula in this regard and streamline it a little bit in line with what the critics say. I personally am not a keyboard warrior so I don't often use hotkeys or other macro's, I just like to take it easy and take everything in at my own pace, but that is just my experience.

Gameplay wise, the game works exactly as intended. Each civ has their strong and weak points, and the best part is that unlike Age of Empires 2, where every civilization had a shared tech tree, only with some unique techs of their own, in Empires Apart every civilization has their own unique playstyle to an extent. The Mongols, for example. play completely different from the Byzantines, and it offers a very unique experience. The AI, however, can sometimes be somewhat buggy, such as prioritizing the wrong targets, ignoring player troops that massacre theirs whilst their cavalry chase down villagers into a fortified base, et cetera. These bugs are not extremely obvious, but they should nonetheless be addressed. Finally, the greatest point of contention for me is that formations don't always work well and units can get stuck in places until you manually move them out of the chokepoint they are stuck in. Nonetheless, this game is very entertaining and great to look at.

Some nitpicks of mine that I had:

-The day/night cycle can be very abrupt, and it is somewhat disorienting to suddenly have to work in the dark. My suggestion is to make this transition somewhat smoother to ease the contrast between day and night.

-No map editor. I realise from conversations on the forums here and around the game's pages that the devs are still hard at work and it is relatively difficult to introduce such grand new features, but I think it's vital that a map editor/scenario creator be implemented to let the community design it's own maps, scenarios and possibly campaigns.

-No campaigns or scenarios. As mentioned in my last point, one of the greatest joys of the Age of Empires series was that they offered scenarios and campaigns that told the stories of famous events in history, with you as the player re-enacting them. These singleplayer experiences really enriched the game and made it much more fun to play alone when you didn't play online. I'm looking forward to maybe playing something akin to that in this game somewhere in the future.

-The biggest problem with the game, as mentioned at the very start of this review, is that the playerbase is small compared to other games. Empires Apart may be considered an in-development game, but if the game wants to grow, there needs to be made more publicity to get people interested in the game and convince them to play.

To sum the entire thing up with a bow on top, I'd say Empires Apart is not Age of Empires. The two are very much alike, yet different in many ways and Empires Apart has the potential to offer some fine and unique experiences, provided the devs keep working and doing their best on improving the game. Considering the game isn't made by some huge developer, I'm confident in saying that the quality of the game in relation to the resources used for making it is really good. I definitely recommend playing this, especially now that the game is essentially free to play.

Last but not least, as a message directly to the developers: Loot boxes have left a sour taste in the mouths of many gamers. I understand that the system you're using is purely for cosmetics and not actually any tangible advantages in-game, but you might want to try to rebrand the whole thing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198273900289', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1562508719}
review:
Gra bardzo ładna i ciekawa jest to kopia age of empiers 2 lecz ma parę swoich nowości przykładowo bohaterowie z swoimi indywidualnymi  umiejętnościami co urozmaica rozgrywkę, przyznaje że jeśli w grę grało by więcej osób z chęcią bym pograł dłużej.Ogólnie grę polecam jednak płatne cywilizacje oraz, lootboxy powodują obniżenie ogólnej oceny gry

Plusy:
-ładna grafika 
-nowe rozwiązania przy  każdej cywilizacji (bohaterowie)
-przyjemna rozgrywka 
-nie zaobserwowałem większych bugów 
-nie laguję

Minusy:
-Póki co pozostaje gra single ponieważ nie ma graczy
-Lootboxy (płatne cywilizacje)
Braki:
-Brak języka polskiego (bardziej  indywidualny minus tej gry mi nie przeszkadzał ponieważ nawet podstawowy angielski wystarczy do ogarnięcia gierki i jej mechaniki  tym bardziej jeśli ktoś grał wcześniej w  aoe2 to dużą część  rzeczy bedzie robić odruchowo)

Ogólna ocena: 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198065960859', 'num_games_owned': 12, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1562695827}
review:
This feels like the Empires game Ive wanted. 
it has the core strategic gameplay down,it runs pretty well,The main menu is a bit odd,but dont let that put you off the fact that this game has big potential and is currently enjoyable to play,as long as it keeps its originality during the course of its development I can see this game being a big success,its a gem. Give it a try and im certain you will enjoy this game. 

Building a base and army from start to finish is satisfying. 
The graphics are decent although the environments could look a bit better.
Overall combat is enjoyable,ai is a little broken.but manages to keep me happy 99% of the time.
Could benefit with better servers,more buildings and a graphics upgrade.
has a decent skill tree,civilisation and economy trees
army/combat management is lacking but the basics do well

Is a good game and I enjoy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198818418829', 'num_games_owned': 28, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1560802590}
review:
Стратегия на минималках
С другом решили потратить время и нашли старый-добрый геймплей в стиле the lord of rings, отличия лишь в том что графика бумажная, но это придает этой игре индивидуальность, что никак не позиционирует её как "плохая игра".
Жаль что другие виды войск за донат , но надо же как то зарабатывать на фри играх.
В общем игра специфическая и на любителя, если любите позалипать в стратегии , то рекомендую,  советую играть с друзьями, что бы не было скучно,но опятьт же -  это  на любителя .

author: {'steamid': '76561198044184382', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 497, 'last_played': 1561650306}
review:
Pas mal pour se lancer dans ce genre de jeu gratuitement, par contre essayez de ne pas buguer sur une partie en ligne car vous avez peu de chance de récupérer la connexion. et tout n'est pas parfaitement clair (j'ai vu qu'il y avait des challenges pour chaque nation mais je ne les trouves pas) le mode survie est inintéressant.

Sinon niveau jouabilité et graphisme il est bien sympathique tout tourne bien le système d'avancement dans les ages est pas mal et les unités bien que classique sont sympa et évolue bien.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139802126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 636, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1589404172}
review: As someone who played RTS's for a while, this is definitely a simplistic but modern take on the genre. It is similar to AOE but less complex. However, I wouldn't say it feels "mobile" as others are saying. Rather, it is a different take which is more fast paced. I personally enjoy this game, and even though its free it feels complete. For a free game, this is definitely worth a try, since if you like it it will take up a lot of time. HOWEVER, make sure that if you plan to play online you have friends, otherwise the game is pretty empty right now. Luckily there is singleplayer to balance things out though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007896072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1060, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 466, 'last_played': 1599752734}
review:
If you like the Age of Empires games, then you might find this an ok game.
Building the base, fighting and harvesting resources should be easy when you've played any of the classic rts games like c&c, dune II, warcraft or AoE.
The fighting hower leaves a bit of a bad taste. There is no feeling of impact when the units do damage and this makes the combat a bit dull.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999193203', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1561532080}
review:
This game is an Age of Empires 2 rip off.  And it's bad at doing so too. However just because it looked like AOE2 from the store page, I gave it a try.

And oh boy, I'm laughing at all these people in the reviews whom call this game "good" and I'll tell you why;

- The mini-map is at the top of the screen and that's painful as there is apparently no way to move it in the UI. Every RTS or MOBA has it's mini-map either at the bottom left or bottom right corner and modern games allow you to change where the mini-map is. It's a thing that has been ground in for decades and our veteran-player-eye-movement is used to this.

- While at first the graphics look "smooth", they are infact horrendous, once you've started playing, as you have no clear distinction between units because of the lack of detail. It's like they were going after Team Fortress 2 meets AOE2 as a graphics style / colour palette but failed by discarding any form of detail and unit distinction.

- Claims itself F2P but hides all of it's civilizations behind a paywall and so you can only play 1 civilization.

edit: spelling mistake.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979402731', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 218, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1561518407}

author: {'steamid': '76561198138133847', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1615840696}
review:
If you own Age of Empires there is absolutely no reason to play this game.  It is Age of Empires, but worse.  Age of Empires 2 is actually cheaper when you consider each army is 5 dollars each.

Examples of annoyance is the decided change of the universal button of escape.  Escape does nothing and while you can rebind the pause menu you can't rebind it to escape because escape in the rebind menu cancels the bind.  Instead the button for pause is all the way on the other side of the keyboard F10.  It is frustrating to be playing a game and want to pause or change some settings and hit the escape button.  Nothing happens.  Hit it again.  Nothing happens.  This is when you get frustrated and start spamming it before remembering, "Oh yeah that is right the developers decided to change it for some stupid reason".  This is not a big issue on the grand scheme of things but it is showing a disregard for standardized systems for their own.  It is enough for me to say "Fuck this game".

Another bad thing is customization.  You can customize your soldiers and some of your buildings.  "Well that doesn't sound too bad what is the catch?" it is based on a loot box system.  I don't mind having to pay for the armies.  I do mind when game developers charge money to gamble.  Thank god there are people making steps to make that horrific toxin out of games but in the mean time there will be games that exploit the addictive nature of humans to make money.  Being "free to play" isn't an argument for a dirty microtransaction system.

Finally there is the single player.  I personally am not someone that likes to play RTS games against other players.  I am not too keen on micro managing units and would prefer to relax while fighting bots with friends.  I don't want to fight friends because being taken out of the game or taking a friend out of the game is just not fun.  With bots you could only have a maximum of 1 bot before the game plummets down to 10 FPS no matter the graphics setting later in the game.  It is atrocious.  Then there is the challenges which are either easy or require a specific timing based strategy and at the best of times is dull and boring and at the worst makes you want to uninstall you computer from the Milky Way.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069989126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1573576911}
review: Il gioco è carino e il fatto che sia fatto da italiani gli fa onore. Ci sono due pecche a mio avviso: la prima è che molti edifici, giocando con i bizantini (è la civiltà gratuita con cui parti), non sono immediatamente riconoscibili, un po' si assomigliano, sarà per il colori uguali, ma non sono distinguibili immediatamente (almeno quelli per produrre unità) a meno che tu non abbia fatto diverse partite o tu li abbia raggruppati vicini; la seconda è che, almeno per le partite contro la IA, non ci sia la capacità di ridurre il tempo almeno per farti prendere fiato, ma alla fine questo gioco si rispecchia in Age of Empire.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119631096', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1559422043}
review: Age of empires a çok benzer bir oyun. Grafikleri oldukça hoş. Age of tarzı seviyorsanız oyuna bir şans verebilirsiniz. Zaten mekanikler neredeyse aynı olduğu için yabancılık çekmezsiniz. Age of kadar strateji kurup üzerine kafa patlatabileceğim kadar ciddiye alamadım oyunu orası ayrı.  Ama yapanların eline sağlık güzel eğlenceli bir oyun olmuş, ücretsiz sunulması da çok hoş.

author: {'steamid': '76561198411352087', 'num_games_owned': 361, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 6226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 599, 'last_played': 1631885756}
review:
普通に楽しいです。AOEシリーズやStarCraftをやっていた人ならすぐ操作に慣れると思います。
それに加えて無料化されたうえ日本語化もされている親切設計。ランク戦も入ってみた感じAOE等の古参ガチ勢にフルボッコにされたりする例の傾向が結構薄かったので新規も他RTSゲーより入りやすいと思います(他よりってだけでRTSゲーは初心者お断りの風潮が強いですが)
基本的にはフレンドと大人数でわちゃわちゃプレイするのをお勧めします。

review: gut ausbalanciertes RTS im Stile von AOE 2. Interessante und sehr verschiedene Völker. Kann kostenlos angespielt werden, macht aber schnell Appetit auf mehr. Kosten für alle Völker sind denke ich gerechtfertigt und gute Entwicklungsarbeit verdient es eben auch, honoriert zu werden!

author: {'steamid': '76561198851204137', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1564765798}
review:
Aki szereti az Age of Empires szériát annak kötelező a játék!
Igaz még csak 1 órám van a játékban de nagyon megtetszett.
1 ingyenes játékhoz képest elég  fasza kis stratégia-RTS játék.
A garfikájával nincs semmi gond. Igaz nem egy realisztikus grafikával rendelkező játék, de ettől eltekintve nekem tetszetős!:D
Ahogy láttam van benne ranked match is, de ezzel az a probléma, hogy nagyon kevesen játszanak ezzel a játékkal. (szerintem.) Ideje ezt a játékot valamilyen formában hirdetni, mert tényleg nagyon jó a játék!
Nem is értem miért raknak rá negatív értékelést, bár attól félek előbb-utóbb megfogom tudni...
Ami egy kicsit nem tetszik nekem az, hogy a katonáim élettelenül harcolnak XDD A harci animációt nagyon elrontották szerintem.:/ Bár lehet, hogy az is közbe játszik, hogy csak alacsony grafikán tudom futtatni a játékot. :'DD (De nem hiszem!)
Mindenesetre nagyon f@sza játék!:DDD

author: {'steamid': '76561198116826169', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 711, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1699467977}

author: {'steamid': '76561198105320573', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1557783250}
review:
玩了一局，几乎就是帝国2的换皮，同时精简了大量内容。
- 相似程度说是抄袭一点也不为过：相同的城镇中心+3农民+1斥候的开局，相同的资源配置 6只羊+4只鹿+2头猪+浆果丛+金矿+石矿，相同的兵种树 兵营步兵+长矛兵 靶场弓兵+投矛+弓骑等等。还削减了帝国2极其丰富的科技树。
- 这个画面只能说仁者见仁智者见智，抛开时代的因素不谈，帝国2的美工水平显然要比这个游戏高多了。
- 本体免费ok，但只有一个民族。每个民族要单独付费解锁，加在一起就很贵了。
+ 开箱抽饰品系统还挺有趣的。（但是要不要做得这么像风暴)

author: {'steamid': '76561198123851195', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1856, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 538, 'last_played': 1565709148}
review:
PRO:
-Buon gameplay e grafica gradevole
-Fazioni ben caratterizzate e bilanciate
-Free-to-play: si possiede una fazione iniziale gratis (Bizantini) e le altre si possono acquistare tramite dlc abbordabili (3.90 circa a fazione) Inoltre tutte le fazioni si possono provare a dovere prima dell'eventuale acquisto. Sono presenti inoltre le classiche casse da aprire che danno comunque solo skin e oggetti estetici. No pay-to-win.
-Diverse modalità (pvp,pve,survival,sfide,..)
-Si può giocare con un amico contro l'IA
-Creatori italiani che è una rarità

CONTRO:
-Combattimenti un po' troppo veloci
-Alcuni bug dell'I.A.
-Sembra non essere più aggiornato

CONCLUSIONE:
Consiglio questo gioco a tutti gli amanti degli RTS vecchio stile. Il gioco riesce ad essere godibile ed interessante.

author: {'steamid': '76561198192951751', 'num_games_owned': 69, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 673, 'last_played': 1687967080}
review:
its simple .. 
if u have friends to play with in this game .. you will have fun
but if no .. you gonna hate this game and uninstall it after few matches
i feel this game unbalanced
like if u played FULL deff with so many fortunes .. a full army with 300 unit cant even defeat you ..
but if u play with friends at least u can make a deal and rules in the match and have fun like not allowing your friend to attack you until the armies are completed etc ..
so in my opinion .. i enjoyed this game cuz i have friends to play with
and the graphics are good and the soundtracks are amazing also the game play and the HUD etc ..
its like an AOE II but a smoother .. but still .. its unbalanced and there an other option .. so i dont recommend this game "for now"

author: {'steamid': '76561198134629942', 'num_games_owned': 247, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 5137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2001, 'last_played': 1690782621}
review:
Great game, more diverse than Age of Empires 2, waiting for more content.
Pros

Farm Auto-Reseeding
One General Deposit
Modern UI and graphics.
Civilizations are more diverse
Wonderful Soundtrack

Cons
Have to buy/earn civilizations
No campaign
AI is not perfect
Smaller Playerbase (I can still find games on a consistent basis.)

Overall, I think this is a superior form of Age of Empires 2, and would recommends this to any one who enjoys strategy games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077057581', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 2214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 580, 'last_played': 1633956957}
review:
I creatori sono italiani e devo dire di esserne molto fiero, visto il parco titoli praticamente inesistente (soprattutto se si parla di qualità)! 
Il gioco in compagnia è piacevole e simpatico, preso da soli potrebbe stancare un pò facilmente per la sua struttura (almeno per ora) molto da "Accesso Anticipato".

-Musiche: Le musiche sono belle e spesso, e trasmettono il giusto per ogni fazione.. forse solo un pò ripetitive a volte, e peccano di non essere contenstuali, ovvero: Quando state costruendo di solito nei giochi RTS c'è un sound tranquillo e quando ti attaccano magari parte un brano più movimentato. Le prime volte all'ascolto devo ammettere di essermi scagazzato pensando mi stessero attaccando, quando invece era andata avanti la "playlist".

-IA: Medio scarsina per certi versi, e uber power per altri. Si incastreranno spesso i mercanti  e i vari soldati, costringendo a volte di spostare le unità in blocchi, specialmente in luoghi stretti.

-DLC: Purtroppo anche qui i DLC regnano, ma i prezzi non sono assurdissimi almeno..come fa invece la serie TotalWar.
è presente uno shop all'interno del gioco che ci farà shoppare tramite le classiche casse con ricompense casuali, o specifici set di casse a tema per ogni fazione. Le casse possono essere acquistate o vinte giocando e salendo di livello e sbloccando alcuni obiettivi. Tranquilli niente PayToWin, dato che si possono solo trovare oggetti cosmetici o diverse skin per armi, armature, elmi, edifici, loghi, bandiere ecc. Contando che ogni fazione ha il suo carattere, la sua identità, sue musiche dedicate e il suo "doppiaggio" direi che il prezzo ci può anche stare.

-Fazioni: Le fazioni non sono nè tante, nè troppe, ci sta per ora. Ogni fazione ha le sue strutture, le sue unità differenti, e i suoi eroi con le loro abilità specifiche. Direi bilanciato sommariamente bene il tutto (per ora), ma si ha un pò la sensazione che cambi in fondo solo la skin alla fazione a volte..e non che ci siano effettivamente due fazioni differenti a confronto. Le musiche relative ad ogni fazione sono molto piacevoli ed ispirate (a parte 1 o 2), non banali come molti stressano nelle recensioni.

-Grafica: E' molto stuzzichevole, minimale e fa il suo. Ottimizzato, per ora, malino.. a volte, spesso dinanzi a molte unità si va a scatti un pochino ma di certo non da sembrare un album fotografico come No Man's Sky il primo anno di vita.
Poligoni quanti ne bastano. Risulta davvero molto rilassante, senza avere 900 dettagli incredibili a sfiancarti la cornea.
Colori tiepidi e azzeccati, tranne qualche (credo) "evento atmosferico" riuscito un pò malino, come delle simil "tempeste di sabbia/foschia" che ti fanno un pò sforzare l'occhio, ma niente di troppo pesante.

-Unità: Ogni fazione ha le sue buone caratteristiche estetiche, sia nell'esercito sia negli edifici. Le statistiche non so ancora se cambino molto di fazione in fazione, mi sembra tutto abbastanza equilibrato a parte qualche arma/abilità speciale.
Le animazioni, buone in alcuni casi e molto povere in altri..soprattutto negli scontri. Spesso non sembra stiano dando una "spadata", sembra stiano dando uno scapelotto sulla nuca tipo "Hai fatto i compiti vero?!?!". Le unità si compenetrano che è un "piacere", quindi potrete vedere negli spazi stretti, degli specie di millepiedi con cavalli, arcieri,lancieri,baliste,argani tutti assieme uniti in una stessa entità senziente, ma dopotutto succede nel 90% di questo tipo di giochi.

-Gameplay: Ovviamente più stimolante e divertente in compagnia. Per ora ci sono solo qualche sfida molto meh, le classiche partite online, le partite da solo contro i bot o con amici contro i bot, o contro gli amici ecc ecc. Ho potuto provare seriamente solo la prima fazione, i Bizantini, in quanto unica scelta disponibile nel FreeToPlay. Le altre fazioni sono testabili in una buona modalità "prova" dove vi cimenteranno in uno scenario con una mappa ristretta, tutte le unità potenziate al massimo del loro splendore ed efficienza e tutti gli edifici disponibili... poi vi faranno assediare una fazione per testare tutte le unità in combattimento (Devo ammettere  che è la miglior modalità Prova/Dimostrazione che abbia mai visto in giochi di questo tipo. Dato che spesso manca proprio o se c'è, è un video o qualcosa di molto deludente). Quindi vi fanno assaggiare un pò le fazioni in DLC, e non è cosa da tutti..anzi.. (vero Total War??VERO??!!). Le mappe al momento non sono molte, ma carine, design morbido e adatto ai biomi selezionati, ma si può fare di più dai.
I combattimenti forse sono un pò troppo rapidi.. passate 1 ora a fare e sudare i vostri uomini e li vedete spegnersi in "un attimo" se la battaglia volge a vostro sfavore. Limite di unità per ora a 300 unità, e devo dire che ci sta, rispetto a molti altri RTS, ci sta..non è cosi limitativo. Diciamo che ci si annienta molto prima dei 200 molto spesso.


Il gioco è FreeToPlay ed è una bella scoperta, nonostante sia ritornato diverse volte sulla pagina di Steam per vedere se fosse in accesso anticipato, a causa di alcuni fatti di "pochezza/inconsistenza" di alcune cose che si percepiscono giocando.
Il titolo merita sicuramente, è ispirato, con un buon lavoro dietro può avere una sua identità (che ha già in parte) ancora più pronunciata ed incisiva. Voglio incoraggiare il Team di sviluppo italiano a migliorare questo titolo, perchè seriamente può ritagliarsi il SUO pubblico, dando qualche colpo deciso e ben pensato di pennello. Arricchite con fazioni e idee, o migliorate ciò che già esiste, poichè ci sia sempre di più giocando la sensazione di Solidità, che alcune volte, almeno io, risento.

Comprerò qualche DLC sicuramente, poichè intrigato e volenteroso di supportare il Team Italiano!

Come dice Renè Ferretti:  << Dai Dai Dai!! >>

I still play age of empires 2 HD, and Age of empires Definitive.. Empires Apart is by far the best.

This will hold me over until AOE 4 :P

author: {'steamid': '76561198799655726', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 406, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1557857879}
review: I just got this game yesterday and I've already played 4 hours of it. By the end of the week, I'll have more. I do like this game. For free, it is one of the best RTS games I've played. Emphasis on "FREE RTS". I will say that it is clearly a Age of Empires ripoff. Having played AoE for more hours than I can count, it reeks of AoE. The controls are the same, a lot of the functions are the same, and some of the gameplay is straight ctrl-c. BUT, that being said, it can actually stand on its own against AoE. You can't play as many cultures, but there are different ones. You can't have as many maps, but you can customize your gameplay more. And you don't have to have an Alienware to run decent graphics. It lacks some more interesting features of a usual RTS, but makes up for it with some unique things like the gear for different units and the chests. Overall, anyone who as ever played the AoE games and liked them will like this one. And even if you just are a fan of RTSs, this isn't a bad one. Don't expect the greatest of strategies tho. A fun game to come back to every once in a while. Oh, and it's free, so there's that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198310084322', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1555706244}
review:
I followed development of this game from almost the start.

What i hoped for is Age of empires like game.
What i don't like, they copied Age of empires, and made it worse... 
Literally reskined Age of empires with numbers changed.

If they only focused on making a good game, instead of trying to copy a game.
I think this game could be good, cause there is allot of effort put intro this game it's visible.

They copied Age of empires to EXTREME details and the core mechanics are wonky AF.
Stuttering units, GUI / UI is hard to learn, In combat units path questionably.

Some thing's that where fixed/solved two decades ago in RTS genre are present in this game.
Even Starcraft2 Recreation of Age of empires "Age of Knights" is better then this game, which is sad to make such statement.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030027761', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 7104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4516, 'last_played': 1556478421}
review: I have been looking for the perfect RTS for my taste for a really long time, and I think I found it. A lot of gameplay elements are similar to Age of Empires, but with modernized controls and sleek interface. On top of that, each civilization has its own unique mechanics and units and feel very different from each other. I cannot recommend this game enough. The community is small but I haven't had too many problems finding ladder games most days. And it's free, so it isn't hard to  try :)

review: With the new update who add level to your profil , loot chest and quest on a daily basis. A great upgrade to the game. There some bug who happen not frequently but overall its sharp. Minimalist graphics look beautiful and runs smootly. Fan of RTS like AoE or W3 will enjoy this game . The hotkey are so intuitive you dont have to search for the key, you try a new civilizations and its like you already the hotkey. All of that in a free to play so , try it !

author: {'steamid': '76561198211192995', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1548802225}
review: Good traditional RTS game, since going free to play the game has stabilised a lot and has grown an acceptable playerbase to find games with. Similar to Age of Empires but brought into the modern age with better controls, faster game flow and unique factions. No campaign for you single player folks but as a multiplayer game it is one of the best modern RTS, certainly coming from such a small indie team.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085750275', 'num_games_owned': 511, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2285, 'last_played': 1568767288}
review:
A good addition to any RTS fan's library - no excuse not to try, it is free!

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Age of Empires style core gameplay
[*]Several asymmetric factions with really cool mechanics (Byzantines/French/Chinese/Arabs/Mongols/Aztecs/Koreans)
[*]Modern UI and controls
[*]Randomly generated maps
[*]Spectator mode
[*]Responsive units
[*]King of the Hill mode
[*]Survival mode
[*]Challenge levels
[*]Skirmish vs AI
[*]Matchmaking, leagues and ladders
[*]Microtransactions are purely cosmetic and faction unlocks. 
[*]You do not need to pay a dime if you have the patience to unlock everything via leveling rewards.
[/list]
[h1]Cons:[/h1]
[list]
[*]No campaign at the time of this review
[*]No replays
[*]Some of the maps are too choke pointy
[*]Naval unit roster has no real sophistication - not on par in its design when compared with land units
[*]A few modern controls are not implemented yet
[*]Rare desyncs still occur
[*]No dedicated servers
[*]No in game leaderboards
[/list]
Overall, in the current state, I'd give the game a 7/10. Will update my review  if there are major updates or if these negative points are addressed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082455031', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1554036804}
review:
Rating: 3 of 10

AOE clone, graphics and music is great, the core mechanics seems okay, but the game itself is shallow with only a handfull of units, upgrades and small tech tree, it feels like a Tablet/Mobile clone with it's shallow zoom, not being able to see your playing properly is a serious irritation, but the worst thing is the stupid loot crates, pointless skins and nations you have to purchase to have any "fun".

Empires Apart could be great, i would not mind paying 20,- USD for it, if they fixed the issues above, i has to matches the level of content you and depth you get with the old classics.

don't spend you time playing this title, if you can't wait for another AOE like RTS do have a look at the open source project called 0.AD

author: {'steamid': '76561198227919936', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 5854, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3489, 'last_played': 1685803273}
review:
Игра отличная! 
Но я особого дисбаланса, на который все жалуются не видел кавалерия конечно сильнее копейщиков (особенно тамплиеров) но "Толпою гасят даже льва", пехоту дешевле и быстрее производить, задави противника числом.
Кстати о числе... при сражении 600 на 600 одновременно серверу мягко говоря хана и это ужасно бесит.
В остальном мне все нравится разрабы молодцы. С друзьями очень весело проводить время. Но допилите эту чертову миграцию хоста и синхронизацию с сервером .

author: {'steamid': '76561198155736100', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 14288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 496, 'last_played': 1614482734}
review:
-Los requisitos mínimos no son correctos almenos en el procesador, pide un Intel Core i5 como mínimo pero yo uso un i3 y me corre perfectamente fluido a máxima población con gráficos al máximo y grabando en HD-

Recomendado tanto para jugadores dedicados como para jugadores mas casuales, gracias a su jugabilidad diferente a cualquier AOE.

Un punto muy positivo es que los desarrolladores escuchan mucho a la comunidad, quieren hacer de empires apart un juego dedicado para los esports a diferencia de los AOE.

Las facciones que son de pago no son caras ($55 Mexicanos) y se pueden conseguir gratuitamente jugando.
Destaco que No es un Pay2Win, nada que ver, pero si puede cambiar radicalmente tu forma de juego, completamente normal y se agradece (Amplifica las posibilidades).

No es complicado ganarle a la IA (punto negativo), pero al final de cuentas, lo que importa son las partidas contra otros jugadores Online.

Hasta el momento no he visto ni un Bug que pueda afectar mucho inGame a diferencia de otros juegos llenos de bugs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026099719', 'num_games_owned': 254, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1096, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1554138139}
review:
I just took a sneak peak into the game but all what I can say is: This game is great! Sure, there are some problems here and there. But all in all it's a classic RTS with enough depth to it and it plays very smooth.

I hope the development team will roll out a good marketing campaign after they polish the game and added a few more civs (Japanese, Wikings, Teutons?). Because the game needs more attention. I also kinda like the cosmetics. It adds the current trend of "making progress" to a RTS. It's nothing you really need but anyway: Cool idea!

I will play a few more games with the free civ. Right now I can't decide which civ I want to train. But maybe, there is the next one about to release right after the corner. ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198376479253', 'num_games_owned': 984, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 433, 'last_played': 1552775407}
review:
Pros:

>Free-to-play.
>Very unique graphical art style.
>Above average RTS elements.
>Unit control elements well done.
>Each faction has their own unique gameplay elements.

Cons:

>Brings not a whole lot of new or unique aspects to the genre.
>Limited single player aspect due to lack of a campaign or story mode.
>Limited multiplayer aspect due to playerbase.
>Very small player base with an average of less than 150 players.
>Some technical problems.

An above average free-to-play RTS that is based on the old school RTS games.
If a fan of old school RTS games it should be worth at least a try, 
however be warned it is not as polished or good as them.
It is currently very early in developmental stage and many 
features can be changed, added or removed.

Overall I give it a 5.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198109339807', 'num_games_owned': 573, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1552835079}
review:
Empire Apart non sarebbe male come titolo, ma a differenza di altri titoli simili non regge il confronto.
Troppi difetti che ho scoperto giocando mi hanno fatto ricredere, ed ero partito con positività.

PREGI
- Grafica semplice.
- Unità, edifici e caratteristiche di ogni civiltà differenti e varie.
- Ripresa di un genere di gioco lasciato un pò in disparte.

DIFETTI
- Sovrapposizione dei testi degli obiettivi con le icone del marcato.
- Ripetività dei suoni delle unità che con troppi click risultano fastidiose.
- Posizionamento delle unità militari alquanto scadente, le unità si intralciano a vicenda.
- Calcolo dei danni sbilanciato, in una partita una trentina di popolani hanno sterminato fanteria e cavalleria come niente.
- IA molto scarsa, risulta più intelligente quella di Empire Earth 2 nella modalità più scarsa selezionabile.
- SOLO una civiltà utilizzabile senza pagare nulla, per le skin ci può anche stare, ma le civilità no; sarebbe stato gradita quanto meno la scelta della civiltà da poter usare.

Spero vivamente che gli sviluppatori facciano un pò di ordine nei loro intenti e migliorino il titolo.

review:
Bom jogo com elementos claramente inspirados em Age of Empires (tem até o sacerdote e só faltou ele falar iolôlô).
Os gráficos são bonitos para o estilo low poly do jogo e a trilha sonora agrada.
A jogabilidade é a padrão em jogos do gênero e se você jogou algum título semelhante não terá dificuldade.
Recomendo jogo, mas não acho que valha a pena pagar pelos packs de civilizações extras.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029736023', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1561153631}
review:
jeu pas fini, pleins de fonctionalitées qu'on retrouve dans tous les jeux de stratégie en temps réel ne sont pas présentes, diplomatie inéxistente, le marché ne sert à rien car impossible d'echanger les ressources qu'on produit trop et donc impossible d'acheter celles qui manquent, l' ia est au fraises, la limite de population est minuscule, les maps sont pas bien grandes, le zoom out max est ridiculement collé au sol, certes c'est gratos mais une seule civilisation jouable sur un total de 8 c est ridicule, y a bien que la touche arty des graphismes qui vaille la peine.....

il est pas désagréable mais il est bien vide et fade comparé à d'autres titres de ce genre maintes fois décliné, passez votre chemin et diriger vous plutôt sur un rise of nation (excellent) ou pour ceux qui  veulent du gratuit de qualité vers O.AD

author: {'steamid': '76561198067435186', 'num_games_owned': 243, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1552234065}

Schade viel Potenzial aber anscheinend steht das Geld im Vordergrund
Erster Eindruck = Nein danke ich bleibe bei AOE und co.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064836935', 'num_games_owned': 328, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 7060, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5166, 'last_played': 1634323845}
review:
101 horas no beta.
30 minutos agora no Free to Play.

Fiquei muito feliz que agora ele ficou free to play, gostei muito desse jogo no beta e finalmente corrigiram o bug que dava no mouse. ele teve MUITAS mudanças, ganhou estatísticas, avatares, missões diárias, sistema de progressão(level), modo online ranqueado e novos modos de jogo. colocaram um sistema de lootbox e inventario na steam, também colocaram DLCs com civilizações o que achei bem feioso. Não tive problemas de fps com muitas tropas na tela como algumas pessoas estão tendo.

Finalizando, é um Age of Empires com textura low poly, com alguns modos de jogo novos, perfil de jogadores e quadro de estatísticas. Sinceramente nada novo me importou muito, eu só jogo o single-player igual no Age of Empires.

author: {'steamid': '76561198198045666', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 1332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 858, 'last_played': 1612043594}
review:
i love the game. I just dislike how the camera i locked in one direction. I'd like to be able to change the position of a camera to do different things. Other than that its a good game 

ignore the above review. Updated as of the 30th of January 2021.

Came back to this game after a long whiles and the game feels more like a cheap mobile game which has been knocked out than a fully fledged pc RTS. The tutorial takes far too long and isn't very informative as to what to do (both my fiance and i both did the tutorial and we got bored)

The graphics are charmingly simplistic which is nice! However the amount of small dlc purchased for each different civilisation is ridiculous. Although the games description says.... 

An exciting free-to-play Real Time Strategy game set in medieval times. Uniquely designed factions, customization options, singleplayer and multiplayer gameplay. Gather resources, raise an army and lead your civilization to victory in a classic RTS, brought to the modern age...

feels more like a boring slow paced game with an ai about as smart as a rock, especially on the island map with only access to a single faction! They expect you to pay for the rest!! On top of the empires chest which are priced at 75p for 1!! Just 1!!! Its ridiculously overpriced! Alongside the cost of just under £4 per different civilisation coming to the grand total of £30 for a "free to play" game. A free to play game that is going to be killed by the greed of the publishers for charging such extortionate amounts for such little return.

Gaming is becoming and excessively expensive hobby so i'd recommend saving your hours for other games that might cost! But atleast not as much as this bs
